sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHUMB in navigation, a vertical circle of any given place, or interſection of ſuch a circle with the horizon ; in which laſt ſenſe rhumb is the ſame with a point of the compaſs.
RHUMB-Line is alſo uſed for the line which a ſhip de-ſcribes when ſailing in the ſame collateral point of the compaſs, or oblique to the meridians.
